input_text:
Job Title: Manager, Engineering Operations

Location: San Diego, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
This is a full-time position located at our Scripps Corporate Office in La Jolla and will require travel to other Scripps Health locations throughout our system. This position is Monday-Friday and will require on-call availability on weekends and nights as needed.

Join the Scripps Health team and work alongside passionate caregivers and provide patient-centered healthcare. Receive endless appreciation while you build a rewarding career with one of the most respected healthcare organizations nationwide.

Why join Scripps Health?

Award-winning Workplace

#5 in Fortune Best Workplaces in Healthcare 2023#78 in PEOPLE Companies that Care 2023#95 in Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work for 2023Recognized by Newsweek as one of America's Greatest Workplaces for Diversity in 2024Nearly a quarter of our employees have been with Scripps Health for over 10 years.

Scripps Health provides what matters most: career growth, delivering superior care to our patients, continuous learning, exceptional benefits, and working for an organization that offers many long-term career paths. Join us and experience a culture where opportunities to advance and the support to get there go hand-in-hand.

The Manager of Engineering Operations is responsible for ensuring the site/facility is prepared for accreditation surveys. Ensures compliance with established standards for quality-of-service indicators, appearance, cleanliness, repair and condition of facility. Investigates delays on work orders, solves problems and ensures completion of work, initiating response to issues which require further action and follow up. Maintains integrity of all engineering programs, systems and documentation.

Required Qualifications

8 years experience in Facilities Services, 2 of which in a Supervisory role within healthcare.High school diploma/GED. 

Preferred Qualifications

Bachelors degreeExperience within an acute care setting.

Scripps Health is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, sexual orientation, or gender identity/expression), age, marital status, status as a protected veteran, among other things, or status as a qualified individual with disability. 

Position Pay Range: $51.68-$77.54/hour

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Manager, Engineering Operations
output_json.summary: Full-time position requiring travel to Scripps Health locations, offering patient-centered healthcare.
job_responsibilities: Ensuring site/facility is prepared for accreditation surveys.
Ensuring compliance with established standards for quality-of-service indicators, appearance, cleanliness, repair, and condition of facility.
Investigating delays on work orders, solving problems, and ensuring completion of work.
Initiating response to issues requiring further action and follow-up.

#95 in Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work for 2023
Recognized by Newsweek as one of America's Greatest Workplaces for Diversity in 2024
Over 25% of employees have been with Scripps Health for over 10 years.
